bank_details.title: Choose the deposit method
bank_details.sub-title: Select a type of payment you want to use for funding Remitbee Wallet. Note, that all these payment methods are
bank_details.failed_interac_payment: Sorry! We were not able to process your payment. Please, try again or select a different payment method.
bank_details.confirm_your_identity_message: Please, take a selfie with your ID using your web camera. If your device doesn't have a web camera, you can complete this step from your phone or tablet. Make sure that all the information, and your face are visible, and photo has a good quality.
bank_details.selfie_instructions: Please, do a selfie with your ID. Make sure that your ID is beside your face and all the information is clearly readable
bank_details.eft_info_tooltip: You can find this information on your cheque book or on your online bank portal
bank_details.institution_no_validation_msg: The institution number must have 3 digits
bank_details.transit_no_validation_msg: The transit number must have 5 digits

flinks.OPERATION_PENDING: The opration is pending in a while, try few minutes later.
flinks.integration_error: We were not able to connect with your bank account. Please try again in a few minutes.
flinks.integration_progress: To link your account can take up to 3 min. Please do not close the window.

amount.title: Enter the deposit amount
amount.sub-title: Enter the amount you want to deposit in your Remitbee Wallet.
